Content.description: The main content of the debate contribution

Author.description: The identifier of the contributing historian (Cassius, Claudia, or Titus)

DebateType.description: The type of debate contribution (POINT, EVIDENCE, COUNTER, CONCESSION, PROPOSAL)

Position.description: The specific position or argument being made

Evidence.description: Supporting evidence or examples for the position

storyPosition.description: The position in the debate structure

previousPosition.description: The previous position this debate contribution continues from
